languages.text: {n}Молитвы техножрецов, обступивших когитатор, почти заглушают звуки оживленного мостика за вашей спиной. Паскаль, напряженно пожирающий взглядом {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}инфопластину{/g} в своих руках, протягивает к вам {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}мехадендрит{/g}.{/n} "Займите свое место у когитатора, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}В инженериуме царит шумный беспорядок. Молитвы {g|Encyclopedia:Technomat}техноматов{/g} смешиваются в бестолковую какофонию, {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторы{/g} поспешно скалывают с деталей варп-двигателя корку из застывшей священной смазки. Посреди этого хаоса застыл Паскаль Ханейманн, напряженно пожирающий взглядом {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}инфопластину{/g} в его руках и будто отрешившийся от происходящего вокруг.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The prayers of the Tech-Priests surrounding the cogitator almost drown out the sounds of the bustling bridge behind you. Pasqal, poring intently over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} in his hands, extends a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} toward you.{/n} "Please take your place at the cogitator, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Молитвы техножрецов, обступивших когитатор, почти заглушают звуки оживленного мостика за вашей спиной. Паскаль, напряженно пожирающий взглядом {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}инфопластину{/g} в своих руках, протягивает к вам {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}мехадендрит{/g}.{/n} "Займите свое место у когитатора, Лорд-капитан".

Pasqal, poring intently over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} in his hands, extends a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} toward you.{/n} "Please take your place at the cogitator, Lord Captain."

Pasqal, poring intently over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} in his hands, extends a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} toward you.{/n} "Please take your place at the cogitator, Lord Captain."

Pasqal, poring intently over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} in his hands, extends a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} toward you.{/n} "Please take your place at the cogitator, Lord Captain."

{n}The prayers of the Tech-Priests surrounding the cogitator almost drown out the sounds of the bustling bridge behind you. Pasqal, poring intently over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} in his hands, extends a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} toward you.{/n} "Please take your place at the cogitator, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}技术神甫们围着沉思者祈祷着，几乎淹没了你身后热闹的舰桥传来的声音。帕斯卡专注地看着手中的{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}数据板{/g}，向你伸出了一条{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}。{/n}“请在沉思者前就座，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The prayers of the Tech-Priests surrounding the cogitator almost drown out the sounds of the bustling bridge behind you. Pasqal, poring intently over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} in his hands, extends a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} toward you.{/n} "Please take your place at the cogitator, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}技术祭司们围着思考器祈祷着，几乎淹没了你身后热闹的舰桥传来的声音。帕斯卡专注地看着手中的{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}数据板{/g}，向你伸出了一条{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}。{/n}“请在思考器前就座，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}考算機を取り囲む技術司祭の祈りが、背後のブリッジの喧騒をかき消しているかのようだった。パスカルは手にした{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}データスレート{/g}に熱心に目を通し、あなたに向かって{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}を差し伸ばした。{/n}「どうぞ、考算機に着いてください、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}The prayers of the Tech-Priests surrounding the cogitator almost drown out the sounds of the bustling bridge behind you. Pasqal, poring intently over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} in his hands, extends a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} toward you.{/n} "Please take your place at the cogitator, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}考算機を取り囲む技術司祭の祈りが、背後のブリッジの喧騒をかき消しているかのようだった。パスカルは手にした{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}データスレート{/g}に熱心に目を通し、あなたに向かって{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}を差し伸ばした。{/n}「どうぞ考算機にお付きください、ロード・キャプテン」
{n}考算機を取り囲む技術司祭の祈りが、背後のブリッジの喧騒をかき消しているかのようだった。パスカルは手にした{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}データスレート{/g}に熱心に目を通し、あなたに向かって{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}を差し伸ばした。{/n}「どうぞ、考算機に着いてください、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: {n}Die Gebete der Techpriester rund um den Cogitator übertönen fast die Geräusche der betriebsamen Brücke hinter dir. Pasqal studiert konzentriert den {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}Datablock{/g} in seinen Händen und streckt einen {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g} in deine Richtung.{/n} "Bitte nehmt Euren Platz am Cogitator ein, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}The prayers of the Tech-Priests surrounding the cogitator almost drown out the sounds of the bustling bridge behind you. Pasqal, poring intently over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} in his hands, extends a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} toward you.{/n} "Please take your place at the cogitator, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Gebete der Techpriester rund um den Cogitator übertönen fast die Geräusche der betriebsamen Brücke hinter dir. Pasqal studiert konzentriert den {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}Datablock{/g} in seinen Händen und streckt einen {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g} in deine Richtung.{/n} "Bitte nehmt Euren Platz am Cogitator ein, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Les prières des technoprêtres qui entourent le cogitateur couvrent presque entièrement les bruits du pont en pleine activité derrière vous. Pasqal, plongé dans la lecture d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}plaque de données{/g}, vous tend une {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrite{/g}.{/n} « Veuillez prendre place devant le cogitateur je vous prie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The prayers of the Tech-Priests surrounding the cogitator almost drown out the sounds of the bustling bridge behind you. Pasqal, poring intently over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} in his hands, extends a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} toward you.{/n} "Please take your place at the cogitator, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les prières des technoprêtres qui entourent le cogitateur couvrent presque entièrement les bruits du pont en pleine activité derrière vous. Pasqal, plongé dans la lecture d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}plaque de données{/g}, vous tend une {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrite{/g}.{/n} « Veuillez prendre place devant le cogitateur je vous prie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: {n}Las plegarias de los tecnosacerdotes que rodean el cogitador casi ahogan el ajetreo del puente a tus espaldas. Pasqal, con toda su atención fija en la {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}tablilla de datos{/g} que porta, te extiende una {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendrita{/g}.{/n} «Por favor, Lord Capitán, ocupe su puesto en el cogitador».
languages.original_text: {n}The prayers of the Tech-Priests surrounding the cogitator almost drown out the sounds of the bustling bridge behind you. Pasqal, poring intently over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} in his hands, extends a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} toward you.{/n} "Please take your place at the cogitator, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las plegarias de los tecnosacerdotes que rodean el cogitador casi ahogan el ajetreo del puente a tus espaldas. Pasqal, con toda su atención fija en la {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}tablilla de datos{/g} que porta, te extiende una {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendrita{/g}.{/n} «Por favor, Lord Capitán, ocupe su puesto en el cogitador».

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayarın etrafındaki Tekno Rahiplerin duaları, arkandaki hareketli köprünün sesini neredeyse bastıracak seviyede. Pasqal dikkatini ellerindeki {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}databelaya{/g} yoğunlaştırıyor, sana doğru bir {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentrit{/g} uzatıyor.{/n} "Lütfen kavramsayardaki yerinizi alın Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}The prayers of the Tech-Priests surrounding the cogitator almost drown out the sounds of the bustling bridge behind you. Pasqal, poring intently over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} in his hands, extends a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} toward you.{/n} "Please take your place at the cogitator, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kavramsayarın etrafındaki Tekno Rahiplerin duaları neredeyse arkanda bulunan hareketli köprünün sesini bastıracak seviyede. Pasqal dikkatini ellerindeki {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}databela{/g}ya yoğunlaştırıyor, sana doğru bir {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentrit{/g} uzatıyor.{/n} "Lütfen kavramsayardaki yerini al Lord Kaptan."
